snippet.title: Baby acne \- Mayo Clinic
snippet.description: Baby acne. Baby acne is usually characterized by small red bumps on a baby's cheeks, chin and forehead. www.mayoclinic.org/diseases-conditions/baby-acne/multimedia/baby-acne/img-20007203 - 27k
